Happy Birthday, President Lincoln. Your words ring true more than two centuries later. We have an obligation, not an option, to protect our nation by remembering the things that unite us are greater than the ones that divide us.

We are all Americans first. I am glad to see President Trump moving forward with the business of leading our country as one in his #SOTU speech. Unity will keep our economy running strong, our nation secure and leave no one behind.
